ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment - Ernst & Young LLP
PrecisOrder Appointing (1) ERNST & YOUNG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario, as AUDITOR of Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation for the year 2017; and (2) the Auditor General of Canada as JOINT AUDITOR of Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation for the year 2017.
